rules_text:
When Effa, Verdurous Critic enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Whenever you attack, double the power of up to one target creature with a counter on it until end of turn.
notes:
New card — Replaced Porridge Ooze

With the Oozes having been reworked, this slot opened up to make room for the legendary judges cycle.
